attributes.action: urge an urgent investigation into the "Bodies Revealed" Exhibition at the Custard Factory, Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Bodies Revealed" is an exhibition of Chinese human cadavres currently taking place in Birmingham. The organisers (Premier exhibitions and Big Cat Promotions) have been unable to provide satisfactory answers about the origin of the bodies, despite credible reports that they may either be victims of torture or those of executed Chinese prisoners.
